name: Gorgon's Fist, Mythic

sections.body: When you hit a creature while using Gorgon's Fist, if the target fails its Fortitude saving throw, it is dazed for 1 round instead of staggered. You can expend one use of mythic power when you hit with a Gorgon's Fist attack, but before the saving throw is attempted, to increase its DC by half your tier.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your strikes debilitate and disorient your foes.
